ygData.subject: Song tactics in groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow Bards, I have been a lone wolf for the first part of my career, and believe I can make it to 20th level without the need of a party (currently
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings fellow Bards,

I have been a lone wolf for the first part of my career, and believe I can make it to 20th level without the need of a party (currently 17th). Tis a lonely life indeed, but my schedule seems to prohibit making long term ties with others. As I approach 20th, I am looking to start grouping in the future. However my lack of experience in group situations might endanger my comrades and myself. Does anyone have a strategy guide for us minstrals? If so I would be greatly interested in hearing your opinions and tactics. I'm looking for a "whatever you do, don't ever play song "XXX" in a group situation in a dungeon!!"

Your humble servant,

Ethric - Bard of Qeynos
(Xegony)
